WorkItem.ClosedComment: Will not be implemented... Enabling php_zip should do the trick.
WorkItem.Description:
Is it possible to use an alternative method for the zip-method? This a PHP method for zipping (there are a lot more... search google)... you can find it here: http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpzip/
Not all webservers support the php_zip module for apache...
 
---------
Â 
PHPExcel makes extensive use of php_zip's "ZipArchive" class, which is not available in these alternative classes. I'll put this on my to do list and research if a custom "ZipArchive" class can be built on top of the library you specified.

Comments.Message: Is there anything I can do in this proces? Are there specific demands to the zip class?
If you can create a PHP class which mimics the ZipArchive methods (i.e. http://nl3.php.net/manual/nl/function.ziparchive-addemptydir.php), this would be useful.
